entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023
